    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static PaydiantLocationUtility getInstance()
        Gets the single instance of PaydiantLocationUtility.
        Returns:
        single instance of PaydiantLocationUtility

      • stopLocationUpdationService

        public void stopLocationUpdationService(Context context)
        Stop location updation service. This method will disconnect the location client, stop the location updating service and remove its registered listener call backs. Better to invoke this method in a scenario when the application is sent to the background. Otherwise it will affect the battery life since the location client will try to update its location time to time using GPS.

      • startLocationUpdationService

        public void startLocationUpdationService(Context context)
        Start location updation service. Before calling the getLocation(Context) method the user needs to invoke this method to connect the location client. It might take a couple of seconds for the location client to be connected. Until that time the developer wont be able to retrieve the location through the getLocation(Context) method.
        Parameters:
        context - the context

      • getLocation

        public Location getLocation(Context context)
        Gets the location. Before calling this method, the startLocationUpdationService(Context) method should be invoked. Once the mGoogleApiClient is connected only the user can get the current location using this method.
        Parameters:
        context - the context
        Returns:
        the location

      • isLocationUpdatesRequested

        public boolean isLocationUpdatesRequested()
        Determines whether the location update services are started or not.
        Returns:
        true if location update services are started, false otherwise.
        Since:
        4.4.0.4
